original_text:
Give a portion to seven, or even to eight,
    for you know not what disaster may happen on earth.
korean_text: 일곱에게나 여덟에게 나눠 줄지어다 무슨 재앙이 땅에 임할는지 네가 알지 못함이니라

sentences.original_text: Give a portion to seven, or even to eight
for you know not what disaster may happen on earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 세상에 어떤 재난이 일어날지 너는 알지 못하니라.
